| HistoryText             = The Pathfinders were an elite exploratory fleet that was directly under the command of [[Lilandra Neramani (Earth-616)|Grand Admiral Lilandra]]. During the Shi'ar civil war between the mad [[D'ken Neramani (Earth-616)|Majestor D'Ken]] and his sister Lilandra, they fought on her side. The Pathfinders attacked the fleet that was transporting a captured Lilandra, giving her time to escape but at the cost of the Pathfinder fleet which was annihilated.{{r|Classic X-Men Vol 1 14}}
